languages.text: {n}Сенешаль вздрагивает.{/n} "Семья? Но, Катарина, моя семья — это ты... и ты... мертва..." {n}Версериан встряхивается, словно со сна, бьет себя по щекам и поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "{name}! То есть, простите, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль вздрагивает.{/n} "Семья? Но, Катарина, моя семья — это ты... и ты... мертва..." {n}Версериан встряхивается, словно со сна, бьет себя по щекам и поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "{name}! То есть, простите, Лорд-капитан!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль вздрагивает.{/n} "Семья? Но, Катарина, моя семья — это ты... и ты... мертва..." {n}Версериан встряхивается, словно со сна, бьет себя по щекам и поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "{name}! То есть, простите, Лорд-капитан!"

{n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

{n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはたじろぐ。{/n}「家族？だがクアサリナ、あなたは私の家族だそれにあなたは…あなたは…死んでいる…」{n}彼は今目覚めたかのように頭を振り、頬を叩き、そしてあなたを見る。{/n}「{name}！失礼しました…その…ロード・キャプテン！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはたじろぐ。{/n}「家族？だがクアサリナ、あなたは私の家族だそれにあなたは…あなたは…死んでいる…」{n}彼は今目覚めたかのように頭を振り、頬を叩き、そしてあなたを見る。{/n}「{name}！失礼しました…その…ロード・キャプテン！」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“我的家人？可奎莎莉娜，你就是我的家人，你……已经去世了……”{n}他摇了摇头，仿佛大梦初醒一般，猛地拍了拍自己的脸颊，随后抬起头，看着你。{/n}“{name}！我很抱歉——我是说，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“我的家人？可奎莎莉娜，你就是我的家人，你……已经去世了……”{n}他摇了摇头，仿佛大梦初醒一般，猛地拍了拍自己的脸颊，随后抬起头，看着你。{/n}“{name}！我很抱歉——我是说，舰长大人！”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se estremece.{/n} «¿Familia? Pero, Quatharina, mi familia eres tú y estás... muerta...». {n}Sacude la cabeza como si despertara de un sueño, se da una palmada en las mejillas y te mira.{/n} «¡{name}! Disculpe... quería decir ¡Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se estremece.{/n} «¿Familia? Pero, Quatharina, mi familia eres tú y estás... muerta...». {n}Sacude la cabeza como si despertara de un sueño, se da una palmada en las mejillas y te mira.{/n} «¡{name}! Disculpe... quería decir ¡Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: {n}Abelard zuckt zusammen.{/n} "Familie? Aber, Quatharina, Ihr seid meine Familie, und Ihr ... seid tot ..." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf, als würde er aus dem Schlaf erwachen, gibt sich selbst ein paar Ohrfeigen, und blickt zu dir auf.{/n} "{name}! Verzeiht, ich meine ... Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard zuckt zusammen.{/n} "Familie? Aber, Quatharina, Ihr seid meine Familie, und Ihr ... seid tot ..." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf, als würde er aus dem Schlaf erwachen, gibt sich selbst ein paar Ohrfeigen, und blickt zu dir auf.{/n} "{name}! Verzeiht, ich meine ... Lord Captain!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard tressaille.{/n} « Ma famille ? Mais, Quatharina, ma famille, c'est toi... Et toi, tu es morte... » {n}Il secoue la tête comme s'il s'éveillait d'un long sommeil, se donne une tape sur les joues et lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « {name} ! Oh, mille excuses, je voulais dire : {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard tressaille.{/n} « Ma famille ? Mais, Quatharina, ma famille, c'est toi... Et toi, tu es morte... » {n}Il secoue la tête comme s'il s'éveillait d'un long sommeil, se donne une tape sur les joues et lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « {name} ! Oh, mille excuses, je voulais dire : {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: {n}Abelard irkiliyor.{/n} "Ailem mi? Ama Quatharina, ailem sensin ve sen... Sen ölmüştün..." {n}Abelard uyanırcasına başını sallayıp kendi yanaklarına tokat atıyor, sonra da başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}! Özür dilerim. Lord Kaptan diyecektim."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard flinches.{/n} "Family? But, Quatharina, you are my family, and you... are dead..." {n}He shakes his head as if waking from sleep, slaps himself on the cheeks, and looks up at you.{/n} "{name}! Apologies — that is to say, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard irkiliyor.{/n} "Ailem mi? Ama Quatharina, ailem sensin ve sen... Sen ölmüştün..." {n}Abelard uyanırcasına başını sallayıp kendi yanaklarına tokat atıyor, sonra da başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}! Özür dilerim. Lord Kaptan diyecektim."
